home.title: Hi! I'm
home.moreme: An electronics engineer, a Frontend Web developer, a follower of Jesus, I am passionate about the world of programming, with great expectations of continuing on the way of growth, because we never stop learning.

info.name: Portfolio
info.description: Portfolio made in Nuxt.js, to know my featured projects as a Frontend developer.

info.name: Social Media Challenge

about.title: About
about.subtitle: me
about.paragraph1: When I'm not coding, on my computer, I enjoy painting outdoors, singing, photography, and baking art-themed cakes.
about.paragraph2: I invite you to grow together, let's contribute to the network of programmers, investigate what you cannot understand, love your curiosity and never give a stop, persevere in your passion. Leave no footprints, leave seeds of faith, hope, work and effort for others to learn and grow from that direction.
about.paragraph3: I send you a big greeting and hug from Venezuela! ðŸ‡»ðŸ‡ª
